translation.en: [interviewer] Are you a dangerous man?
The question first is whether I committed murder.
translation.it: La domanda è se ho commesso un omicidio.

translation.en: And did you?
The courts, they have decided... no.
translation.it: I tribunali si sono pronunciati: no.

translation.en: I have faced trials.
I have faced allegations.
And the courts, they have decided.
That doesn't answer my question, does it?
That's my answer.
There are those who would say you got away with it.
translation.it: Secondo qualcuno lei l’ha fatta franca.

translation.en: That's what Time magazine said.
translation.it: Così ha detto la rivista Time.

translation.en: Perhaps it's true.
After all, I cannot now face trial...
translation.it: D'altronde non posso più essere processato,

translation.en: anywhere in the world.
-[man] Time to party, girls. -[women laugh]
Come on. [chuckles]
Wait, wait, wait.
This is Alain, who I was telling you about.
translation.it: Lui è Alain, quello di cui vi ho parlato.

translation.en: -Welcome to Kanit House. -Hello.
-Get them a drink, Ajay. -With pleasure.
[in French] Looks like it's a fun night.
[in French] The usual, my angel.
[Charles] Relax, we must take the fever down. [man] I want to go home.
translation.it: - Rilassati, facciamo scendere la febbre. - Voglio andare a casa.

translation.en: [in French] Can you bring me his bag?
Our home is Bangkok,
but next summer we'll open offices in Paris and Zurich.
translation.it: ma in estate apriremo degli uffici a Parigi e a Zurigo.

translation.en: We have a network of couriers throughout Asia and Western Europe.
translation.it: Abbiamo una rete di corrieri in Asia e in Europa occidentale.

translation.en: Which is how we are able to offer such attractive prices.
translation.it: Per questo siamo in grado di offrire prezzi così allettanti.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Oh, it's all right.
Who are you buying for?
Oh, I'm not really buying.
-You're Dutch? -Yes.
But not entirely kwailo, are you?
translation.it: Ma non sei del tutto kwailo, vero?

translation.en: You're like me.
Yeah. My father's from Indonesia.
Mine is Indian,
and my mama is from Vietnam.
But listen to me and I am French.
It can be confusing sometimes.
-I'm Alain. -Willem.
-Wim. -My wife, Monique.
-Oh, hi. -Enchantée.
-Wim. -Don't you want to know the cost?
translation.it: - Wim. - Non vuoi sapere quanto costa?

translation.en: Okay, yeah.
That one.
Then you are buying for someone.
-Yeah. -What is her name?
-Lena. -Lena?
-Wow, is he a professional? -He is.
You're in very good hands.
-[in Cantonese] How much? -[man replies]
If you'd like, I'm certain I can break him down to... this?
translation.it: Se vuoi, sono sicuro di poterlo far scendere fino a qui.

translation.en: Thank you. Sorry, I...
I should go. Sorry.
My friend?
How long have you been gone from home?
-A year. -And you have not run out of money yet?
translation.it: - Un anno. - E non hai ancora finito i soldi?

translation.en: No, we've been... sensible.
But still, you want to tell Lena that you love her.
translation.it: Eppure vuoi dire a Lena che la ami, no?

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
If I told you...
I could have you made a sapphire set in diamonds
translation.it: che potrei farti incastonare uno zaffiro con dei brillanti

translation.en: on a platinum ring for half the price I just showed you,
translation.it: su un anello di platino, per metà del prezzo che hai visto,

translation.en: what would you say?
[woman, in Dutch] We didn't come out here for jewelry.
translation.it: Non siamo qui per i gioielli. FATTO IN OLANDA

translation.en: [in Dutch] That money could keep us going to Kathmandu, even Kabul.
translation.it: Con quei soldi possiamo arrivare a Katmandu, o a Kabul.

translation.en: [in Dutch] We've got to go home some time.
translation.it: E dovremo anche tornare a casa.

translation.en: -[in Dutch] You want to go home? -[music plays on radio]
[in Dutch] Just whatever's next for us.
translation.it: Al prossimo posto che ci aspetta.

translation.en: [in Dutch] An apartment?
[in Dutch] A houseboat maybe.
[in Dutch] Like an old married couple, then? -[in Dutch] An old married couple? -[she yells and laughs]
translation.it: - Come una vecchia coppia sposata. - Una vecchia coppia sposata?

translation.en: -Hello, Wim. -[chuckles] Lena.
-Hi. -Hi.
Mon dieu! You're so pretty.
There's no obligation.
Try it on.
[Lena] Wow.
Still a lot of money.
We understand.
You do not need to decide now. Do they?
translation.it: Ma non dovete decidere adesso. Non è così?

translation.en: Of course not.
We're going to see you in Bangkok, yes?
Well, all right.
Are you sure it's okay for us to stay?
-Yes, of course it is. -Our home is always open to friends.
translation.it: - Sì, certo. - La nostra casa è sempre aperta.

translation.en: Let him buy you the ring, Lena.
translation.it: Lascia che ti compri l'anello, Lena.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Is that okay?
-[in Dutch] Are you sure? No... -[in Dutch] Yes... Of course.
[Lena, in Dutch] Let's dance!
-Yes? -[woman] Mr. Knippenberg?
Yes, Lawana?
Uh, what time did the others leave?
translation.it: A che ora sono andati via gli altri?

translation.en: [sighs] That long, huh?
It's just this gentleman, Mr. Hilgers,
translation.it: Il problema è che questo signore, il signor Hilgers,

translation.en: is asking for help in locating his sister-in-law Helena Dekker
translation.it: ci ha chiesto aiuto per rintracciare sua cognata Helena Dekker

translation.en: and Willem Bloem, her boyfriend.
translation.it: e Willem Bloem, il suo fidanzato.

translation.en: To help us, he also enclosed an accompanying package
translation.it: Per facilitarci il compito ha allegato un pacchetto

translation.en: of holiday photographs and letters home.
But that package has not arrived.
translation.it: Ma quel pacchetto non è mai arrivato.

translation.en: How can we help find them if we've lost their damn photographs?
translation.it: Come facciamo a trovarli senza le foto?

translation.en: Perhaps if you left it with me?
translation.it: Forse se lascia che me ne occupi io...

translation.en: Of course.
What do they say, Yotin?
They talk about the Communists, sir.
In Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia.
They ask if Thailand might also fall to revolution.
translation.it: Si chiedono se anche in Tailandia scoppierà una rivoluzione.

translation.en: Well, it might improve the traffic.
[in Thai] Jasmine, sir?
[in Thai] No, thank you.
[in Dutch] Goddamnit.
Yotin, it started at 4:00 and it's already quarter past.
translation.it: Yotin, siamo fermi dalle 16:00, è già passato un quarto d'ora.

translation.en: Surely it would be quicker to walk? This is Athidhaya Road.
translation.it: Faccio prima a piedi. Questa è Athidhaya Road.

translation.en: The athletic club is only three or four blocks north.
translation.it: L’Athletic club è a quattro isolati.

translation.en: -But Mr. Knippenberg-- -I can't just sit here.
translation.it: - Sig. Knippenberg... - Non posso restare seduto.

translation.en: -Oh. S-Sorry. -[man replies in Thai]
-Herman! -Hi.
Are you all right?
[in Dutch] Ambassador. I'm sorry, the traffic was unbelievable.
translation.it: Ambasciatore. Mi scusi, il traffico era incredibile.

translation.en: [in Dutch] We didn't move a yard in 30 minutes, and the rain...
translation.it: Siamo rimasti fermi per mezzora, e la pioggia...

translation.en: This is Knippenberg, my Third Secretary.
translation.it: Lui è Knippenberg, il mio Terzo Segretario.

translation.en: Knippenberg, this is Giles Easton, my opposite number with the British.
translation.it: Knippenberg, lui è Giles Easton, il mio omologo britannico.

translation.en: -How do you do? How do you do? -Good afternoon.
-Good shot! -Ambassador, may I speak with you--
That is Mrs. Knippenberg.
I told Angela to play with De Jongh. As you were late.
translation.it: Ho detto ad Angela di giocare con De Jongh, eri in ritardo.

translation.en: -You didn't tell me she was learning Thai. -Did I not?
translation.it: - Non sapevo studiasse il thai. - No?

translation.en: To add to the four or five other languages she already speaks.
translation.it: Oltre alle quattro o cinque lingue che già parla.

translation.en: If she wasn't German, I'd offer her a job!
translation.it: Se non fosse tedesca, le offrirei un lavoro.

translation.en: Well, if you weren't Dutch, I might take it.
translation.it: E se lei non fosse olandese, lo accetterei.

translation.en: Mr. Ambassador, may I speak with you briefly on a consular matter?
translation.it: Quando ha finito, potrei parlarle di una questione consolare?

translation.en: I thought the office was shut.
Yes, no, of course, but I thought this was rather urgent.
translation.it: Certo. Ma ho pensato che fosse piuttosto urgente.

translation.en: Two young Dutch backpackers.
Their families haven't heard from them in over two months.
translation.it: Le famiglie non hanno loro notizie da oltre due mesi.

translation.en: Knippenberg, when did you last speak to your mother?
translation.it: Da quanto tempo non parli con tua madre?

translation.en: And does she write letters declaring you missing?
translation.it: E lei scrive lettere per dichiararti scomparso?

translation.en: It's not a diplomat's job to go chasing after longhair bums.
translation.it: Non è compito di un diplomatico rincorrere dei vagabondi capelloni.

translation.en: If it's for anyone, it's for the Thai police.
Pass it on to them if you're so concerned.
translation.it: Passa la faccenda a loro, se sei preoccupato.

translation.en: Yes, sir, of course, Ambassador.
Oh, good shot.
[Dutch ambassador] Once again, a Dutch triumph over you Brits.
translation.it: Ancora una volta, un trionfo olandese su voi britannici.

translation.en: [Easton] Yes, please!
Hey, Herman.
[in Dutch] Congratulations.
-Hello. -What was all that?
It's, uh, two missing Dutch.
Worried family. But it's a police matter, apparently.
translation.it: Le famiglie sono preoccupate. Ma è compito della polizia.

translation.en: My mother warned me about this.
"He takes his work too seriously.
He will never take the day off to make love to you
translation.it: Non farà vacanza per fare l’amore con te

translation.en: on the 15th floor of the Siam Point."
Well, it only has eight floors, so technically, she was correct.
translation.it: Ha soltanto otto piani, quindi tecnicamente aveva ragione.

translation.en: [in Dutch] Why are you writing that? Alain said we could stay at his place.
translation.it: Perché scrivi così? Alain ha detto che possiamo stare a casa sua.

translation.en: [in Dutch] It's too much. Too generous.
[in Dutch] But Alain is expecting us.
[in Dutch] We can go and see them later.
Is it you?
Yeah.
I'm Ajay.
-Alain sent me. I work for him. -How did you know it was us?
translation.it: - Mi manda Alain. Lavoro per lui. - Come sapevi che siamo noi?

translation.en: Well, there's the orange.
But, really... that, of course.
translation.it: Ma in realtà per questo, ovviamente.

translation.en: Let me help you with your bags. We're all expecting you.
translation.it: Vi aiuto con i bagagli. Vi aspettavamo.

translation.en: We were planning on going to the Santa Cruz first?
translation.it: Volevamo andare prima al Santa Cruz...

translation.en: The Santa Cruz?
No. Alain wouldn't allow it. Not for his friends.
translation.it: No. Alain non lo permetterebbe. Non è per i suoi amici.

translation.en: That place gets worse by the week.
The bathwater comes straight out of the klong.
translation.it: L'acqua del bagno viene direttamente dal Klong.

translation.en: People get robbed.
-We don't want to go to the-- -No.
Welcome to Bangkok. Come on, then. [chuckling]
[Ajay] Look who I found.
-[Charles] Hey. Welcome. -[Monique] Lena!
[Monique] You made it.
-[Lena] Nice to see you. -[Monique] You too. Welcome.
translation.it: - È bello rivederti. - Anche per me. Benvenuta.

translation.en: -Welcome to Kanit House. -[Wim] Thank you very much.
-How was the trip? -Yeah, it was good.
This is Frankie.
-Our friend Dominique. -Bonjour.
-This is for you. For you. -Thank you.
-Fresh towel. -Well, thank you very much.
translation.it: - E un asciugamano pulito. - Grazie mille.

translation.en: It's really good.
[Dominique] Here, I'll take your bag for you.
[Charles] Come on. We'll wash your dirty things for you.
-[Wim] But it's all dirty. -[Charles] Then we'll wash it all.
Won't we, Dominique?
Yes, Alain.
[in Dutch] Thanks for not listening to me.
translation.it: Grazie per non avermi dato ascolto.

translation.en: [Charles] Now, wash, rest. Make yourself at home.
translation.it: Lavatevi, riposate. Questa è casa vostra.

translation.en: [in Thai] I'm calling from the Dutch Embassy on behalf of Herman Knippenberg.
translation.it: Chiamo dall'ambasciata d'Olanda da parte di Herman Knippenberg.

translation.en: [in Thai] I'd like to talk to someone concerning a missing persons enquiry.
translation.it: Vorrei avere informazioni riguardo ad alcune persone scomparse.

translation.en: I am very sorry, Mr. Knippenberg,
but the police ask us to call back after the holiday.
translation.it: ma la polizia chiede di richiamare dopo le vacanze.

translation.en: -But that's three days. -[woman outside] Lawana!
-Okay, Lawana, you can go. -Sir.
[in Dutch] Knippenberg, you've passed that business onto the police?
translation.it: Hai passato quella questione alla polizia?

translation.en: [in Dutch] Yes, Ambassador.
[in Dutch] Just this moment.
[man, in French] Belgium.
Oh, Mr. Siemons? It's Herman Knippenberg.
I sit on the Intergovernmental Narcotics Liaison with you.
translation.it: Sono nell'Ufficio Intergovernativo Narcotici con lei.

translation.en: -[Siemons] Which one are you? -[Herman] Excuse me?
translation.it: - Lei di qual è? - Mi scusi?

translation.en: -[Siemons] Nation! -[Herman] Oh! Dutch.
[Herman] I believe the Belgian Embassy
translation.it: Credo che l'ambasciata del Belgio le abbia chiesto

translation.en: also asks you to manage its more irregular problems.
translation.it: Credo che l'ambasciata del Belgio le abbia chiesto di occuparsi di questioni un po' anomale.

translation.en: [Siemons] And what can I do for you, my clog-wearing friend?
translation.it: E cosa posso fare per lei, amico con gli zoccoli?

translation.en: You know they're not technically your problem?
translation.it: Sa che non è tecnicamente un suo problema?

translation.en: Yes. The Ambassador says to phone the police,
translation.it: L'ambasciatore dice che è compito della polizia,

translation.en: but they're on holiday.
[laughs] Yeah, I'll bet they are.
[in Thai] Are you eating?
[in Thai] Soup?
No soup. [speaks Thai]
They expect great things of you, I imagine.
translation.it: Si aspettano grandi cose da lei, immagino.

translation.en: Pardon me?
-You have a master's degree? -Yes.
Advanced International Studies.
Taken at Johns Hopkins, Bologna and Washington.
translation.it: Conseguita alla John Hopkins, Bologna e Washington.

translation.en: -You did well? -Yes. A distinction.
translation.it: - Ha preso un bel voto? - Sì. Un voto alto.

translation.en: And now you want to fuck it all up?
Good for you!
-Now, you want to find them? -Well, yes.
Then pay attention.
First, did they even get here?
translation.it: Prima di tutto, sono arrivati qui?

translation.en: If they did, there will be documentation. Landing cards.
translation.it: Tutto viene documentato. Carte di sbarco.

translation.en: [Yotin translates] They definitely arrived, sir.
Check the major Poste Restantes.
These young travelers rely on them for news from home.
translation.it: I giovani li usano per avere notizie da casa.

translation.en: So, check if they pick up any letters.
translation.it: Controlli se hanno ritirato delle lettere.

translation.en: [Angela] I thought the Ambassador told you to pass it on to the police?
translation.it: L’ambasciatore non ti aveva detto di passare la questione alla polizia?

translation.en: [Herman] It's just one phone call.
What do you think?
Well, I think it's disobedient.
I don't speak the language, Angela.
translation.it: Io non parlo la lingua, Angela.

translation.en: [in Thai] Do you have any letters for Willem Bloem or Helena Dekker?
translation.it: Avete lettere per Willem Bloem o Helena Dekker?

translation.en: [man replies in Thai] Six for Bloem from Amsterdam.
Yes, there are letters.
He never collected them?
Did you ever hear of this place?
Santa Cruz Hotel.
It's one of those traveler hostels.
It's where I go to buy your pot.
-I don't smoke pot. -[Angela chuckles]
Come.
-Hello. -Who are you, man?
I wonder if you might help me. I work for the Dutch embassy.
translation.it: Forse può aiutarmi. Lavoro per l’ambasciata d'Olanda.

translation.en: I'm looking for two people.
A Miss Helena Dekker
and a Mr. Willem Bloem.
Here on their landing cards it says Santa Cruz Hotel.
translation.it: Sulle carte di sbarco c'è scritto Hotel Santa Cruz.

translation.en: I wonder if you could look to see if they checked in?
translation.it: Potrebbe controllare se si sono registrati?

translation.en: It should be December 11th or 12th.
translation.it: Dovrebbe essere l'11 o il 12 dicembre.

translation.en: They were never here, man.
See for yourself.
Hey, Company Man! Are you done? Or do you need a xerox?
translation.it: Ehi, uomo d’affari! Hai finito? O ti serve una fotocopia?

translation.en: Thank you.
So they arrived in Bangkok,
but never made it to the hotel.
translation.it: ma non sono andati in albergo.

translation.en: Where did they go?
Perhaps they didn't stick to their schedule, Company Man.
[American accent] Sorry. I just got in.
-Bad jet lag. -[English accent] No hassle, man.
translation.it: - Brutto jet lag. - Non c'è problema.

translation.en: How long are you staying?
Um... I'm heading to Nepal tomorrow.
translation.it: Devo partire per il Nepal domani.

translation.en: Oh. That's cool.
Do you want to split a room maybe? Might be cheaper.
translation.it: Ti va di dividere la stanza? Magari ci costa un po' meno.

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
-All right. -Okay, cool.
Two.
-[English girl] Hey, what's your name? -[American girl] Teresa.
Oh, no. No, thanks.
Hey, you're not a Jesus freak, are you?
translation.it: Non sarai una fanatica di Gesù?

translation.en: Why Nepal if you don't smoke hash?
translation.it: Perché il Nepal, se non fumi hashish?

translation.en: Kathmandu is still freak Nirvana.
translation.it: Kathmandu è ancora il Nirvana dei drogati.

translation.en: I'm not going to Kathmandu.
Sure you don't want to get high?
Why get high, Celia?
I mean, isn't all this a little bit of a trip already?
translation.it: Tutto questo non è già di per sé un po' uno sballo?

translation.en: This is...
Maybe you should keep it.
-Do you want it? -Yes, I do.
Seriously, maybe you're, like, my spirit guide or something.
translation.it: Magari sei il mio spirito guida.

translation.en: -Your spirit guide? -Yeah.
Well, your spirit guide needs a fucking drink.
translation.it: Il tuo spirito guida ha bisogno di bere!

translation.en: So you drink, then?
Follow your spirit guide.
Follow me.
-[Ajay] Hey. -[Celia] Hi.
-I'm Ajay. -Celia.
-Celia? Ah! What are you doing tonight? -Thanks.
translation.it: - Celia? Che cosa fai stasera? - Grazie.

translation.en: -You two are friends? -Yeah.
Hey, there's a party, you guys should both come.
translation.it: C'è una festa, dovreste venirci tutte e due.

translation.en: -Don't know. -Really, it'll be a cool scene.
translation.it: - Non lo so. - È un bel posto.

translation.en: Hip, you know? Not like the tourists here.
translation.it: Molto fico. Non come i turisti qui.

translation.en: Save it for the next two girls you pick up.
The next two girls won't be you two though, will they?
translation.it: Le prossime non saranno come voi.

translation.en: There's a pool. Bring your bikinis and we can have a swim.
translation.it: C'è una piscina. Portate i bikini, e faremo una nuotata.

translation.en: Or don't bring your bikinis, and we can have a swim.
translation.it: Oppure non portateli, e faremo una nuotata.

translation.en: Let's drop him. He's a creep.
translation.it: Lasciamolo perdere. È un tipo disgustoso.

translation.en: -Celia... -Yeah?
-Let me tell you where I'm headed. -Yeah?
translation.it: - Ti dico dove sono diretta. - Sì?

translation.en: I'm going to a Buddhist monastery.
translation.it: Sto andando in un convento buddista.

translation.en: I was there a year ago and I'm going back, but to live.
translation.it: Ci sono stata un anno fa e ci sto tornando, ma per viverci.

translation.en: What? Like a nun?
translation.it: In che senso? Tipo una suora?

translation.en: Not "like". Actually a nun.
translation.it: Non tipo. Proprio come una suora vera.

translation.en: There's a whole bunch of things that I will never get to do again,
translation.it: Ci sono un mucchio di cose che non potrò più fare

translation.en: and I want to do them now.
What, with that guy?
-If you're sure. Okay. -Hey, you're amazing.
translation.it: - Se sei sicura, ok. - Sei fantastica!

translation.en: So are you. So are you, hon.
-Erm, okay, cool, well, have fun. -I'll see you...
-Yeah. -Maybe.
Welcome back. What's your name?
translation.it: Bentornata! Qual è il tuo nome?

translation.en: [Teresa] Oh, just some shit.
[Ajay] "Some shit." Great.
[Herman] I did everything you said, Paul. Wim Bloem and Lena Dekker
translation.it: QUATTRO MESI DOPO Ho fatto come dicevi. Wim e Lena

translation.en: landed in Bangkok but never checked in to their--
translation.it: sono atterrati, ma non sono andati in albergo.

translation.en: [Australian accent] Oi, Siemons! Who's your girlfriend?
translation.it: Ehi, Siemons! Chi è la tua ragazza?

translation.en: -[laughs] Laver. Australia. -Laver, like the tennis player, right?
translation.it: - Laver. Australia. - Come il giocatore di tennis, giusto?

translation.en: Nothing like, mate. More's the fucking pity.
translation.it: Per niente come lui. Io faccio pena.

translation.en: -"Nippenberg" from the Dutch. -It's "Knippenberg".
[slurring] How long you got left, Ker-nippenberg?
-Left? -Before you go home?
translation.it: - Mi rimane? - Per tornare a casa.

translation.en: Quite some time. We only arrived six months ago.
translation.it: Un bel po' di tempo. Siamo arrivati solo sei mesi fa.

translation.en: -"We"? -My wife and I.
Jesus. Good luck with that.
Knippenberg has lost a couple of longhairs
translation.it: Knippenberg ha perso un paio di capelloni

translation.en: and it's troubling him.
Peace and love, right, Knippenberg?
They're someone's children and they're missing.
translation.it: Sono i figli di qualcuno e sono scomparsi.

translation.en: They're work-shy hobos, mate.
I disagree. What they do is hard work.
translation.it: Non è vero. La vita che fanno è dura.

translation.en: There's no five-star hotels,
no air-conditioning, no drivers.
Let's get them all a fucking medal, shall we?
Living in Squalor Medal.
Gentlemen. My apologies.
If you'll excuse me for one moment?
[manager] Your friends are not welcome here. [man] Let's move over here.
translation.it: - Le sue amiche non sono benvenute. - Spostiamoci là.

translation.en: [Laver] I'll tell you a story about longhairs.
translation.it: Ti racconto una storia sui capelloni.

translation.en: It's a good story, once you get to the end. [sniffs]
translation.it: È una bella storia, quando arrivi alla fine.

translation.en: I had a pair of murder victims on a Thai cop mortuary slab.
translation.it: Avevo due vittime di omicidio nell'obitorio della polizia tailandese.

translation.en: Aussie hippy kids, Knippenberg.
On their fucking hippy trip.
translation.it: Seguivano una rotta hippie del cazzo.

translation.en: They'd been killed, set on fire,
their faces disfigured.
They found them in a ditch 58 Ks south of the old city at Ayutthaya.
translation.it: Erano in un fosso a 58 km a sud di Ayutthaya.

translation.en: I thought you said this was a good story?
You got to wait to the end, don't you?
You ever go to bed with two women at the same time?
translation.it: Sei mai andato a letto con due donne contemporaneamente?

translation.en: The travelers, what happened to the travelers?
translation.it: Che è successo a quei viaggiatori?

translation.en: -Forgive me, the Belgian attaché... -[whistling] ...is a constant embarrassment.
translation.it: Scusatemi, l'attaché belga è sempre motivo di imbarazzo.

translation.en: Asshole.
-[Australian man] Time to go, mate. -[Laver] My advice?
Don't waste your time with longhairs.
-Night, gents. -Where's he going?
He's worried about the curfew.
translation.it: È in ansia per il coprifuoco.

translation.en: Right. Aren't you?
I'm staying right here till morning.
translation.it: Io resto qui fino a domattina.

translation.en: See it through with me, Cloggy.
-Sorry, Paul. -[chuckles]
Mr. Laver, your story about the two Australian travelers?
translation.it: Signor Laver. La storia sui due viaggiatori australiani.

translation.en: Johnson and Rosanna Watson.
-That was their names? -That's who the cops thought they were.
translation.it: - Si chiamavano così? - I poliziotti pensavano che fossero loro.

translation.en: -[man announces over PA in Thai] -But they weren't?
Told you it was a good story.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che era una bella storia!

translation.en: So your bodies, you still have no names for them?
translation.it: Quindi non sa di chi sono i suoi corpi?

translation.en: No! Not mine. Not my bodies.
translation.it: No! Non sono miei. Non sono i miei corpi.

translation.en: Not any more, mate. That's someone else's problem.
translation.it: È un problema di qualcun altro.

translation.en: -Whose? -Whose what?
Whose problem are the two unidentified bodies?
translation.it: Di chi è il problema dei due corpi non identificati?

translation.en: Whose bloody murder case is it?
translation.it: Di chi cazzo è il caso di omicidio?

translation.en: Hey! Keep your hair on, you little fucking mouse with clogs on.
translation.it: Ehi, non scaldarti tanto, topino del cazzo con gli zoccoli.

translation.en: It's the Western District Division.
translation.it: È della Divisione del Distretto Occidentale.

translation.en: No, wait! Eastern.
-Eastern Division. You're sure? -Sure as eggs, mate.
And the Australian couple, where are they now?
What I've been trying to tell you, mate.
translation.it: È quello che cercavo di dirti prima.

translation.en: They just showed up.
They've been on some island living on coconuts and fish heads.
translation.it: Erano su un'isola, e vivevano di noci di cocco e teste di pesce.

translation.en: Stupid fucking hippies.
[man] Let's go for this one.
Excellent choice.
[Wim] Excuse me, Alain. Have you seen Lena?
-Pool, I think. -All right, thank you.
[Monique] I brought you a beer.
-Thank you. Cheers. -Cheers.
[Lena] So you are French?
Québécoise. Canada. The French part.
It's amazing, right?
The friends you make when you're far away from home.
translation.it: Le amicizie che si fanno lontano da casa.

translation.en: -It's the best thing about it, I think. -Yes.
translation.it: - È la cosa più bella. - Sì.

translation.en: So, can I ask how you guys ended up here together?
translation.it: Senti, ti posso chiedere come siete finiti qui insieme?

translation.en: I came for a holiday.
But you didn't go home?
translation.it: Ma non sei più tornata a casa?

translation.en: I did not.
He made it impossible for me.
translation.it: Lui me l'ha reso impossibile, capisci?

translation.en: [Charles] Hello, Wim.
-Sleep well? -Yeah, like a child.
translation.it: - Dormito bene? - Sì, come un bambino.

translation.en: [Monique] And you two?
[Lena] We were just friends.
You two are going to get married, yes?
translation.it: Tu e Lena vi sposerete, non è vero?

translation.en: Well, she's not marrying anyone else, that's for sure.
translation.it: Beh, lei non sposerà nessun altro, questo è sicuro.

translation.en: Well, you're adorable together.
-[Lena] Not as romantic as you and Alain. -I want to help you.
translation.it: - Tu e Alain siete molto romantici. - Voglio aiutarvi.

translation.en: Those two stones you just saw me sell?
translation.it: Sai le due pietre che ho venduto?

translation.en: Two of those you could sell in Amsterdam for 15,000 guilders.
translation.it: Potresti venderne due ad Amsterdam per 15.000 fiorini.

translation.en: Lena says she doesn't care about money.
translation.it: A Lena non importa del denaro.

translation.en: Of course she does. She's young.
And she's a little bit of a hippy.
But she doesn't face the same challenges you do.
translation.it: Ma lei non deve affrontare le tue stesse sfide.

translation.en: I know what it's like, Wim, back in Europe.
translation.it: Io so come funziona in Europa...

translation.en: When you're like us.
There's two men applying for the same position,
translation.it: Se due uomini fanno domanda per lo stesso posto,

translation.en: they take the whitest one.
It happened to my father all the time.
translation.it: A mio padre è successo continuamente.

translation.en: I think every man must one day make a home.
translation.it: Io penso che ogni uomo debba mettere su famiglia.

translation.en: And say to himself, "This is my life,
translation.it: E debba dire a se stesso: "Questa è la mia vita,

translation.en: this is my love,
and this is who I am."
But to get there, for men like you and me,
translation.it: Ma per arrivarci, gli uomini come me e te,

translation.en: we must take our opportunities when they come.
translation.it: devono cogliere le opportunità al volo.

translation.en: [Lena, in Dutch] Are you sure we should do that?
[Wim, in Dutch] Yeah, I...
[Lena, in Dutch] I know they want to help, but...
[Charles] Are they still out there?
Down in the pool.
[Ajay] How much they got?
More than he told me they had.
translation.it: Più di quanto aveva detto lui.

translation.en: [Ajay] Oh! Don't you just hate a lie?
You know, we only want to help.
I know.
[Monique] Alain thinks you don't understand.
translation.it: Alain pensa che tu non capisca.

translation.en: I do understand.
He wants us to buy the gems
and sell them for twice what we paid when we get home.
translation.it: e le rivendiamo al doppio del prezzo.

translation.en: You don't think that's a good idea?
The money will give you a good start,
translation.it: Il denaro vi farà partire col piede giusto,

translation.en: a nice life.
-In any case, we really can't afford it. -I don't believe you.
translation.it: - Comunque non possiamo permettercelo. - Non ti credo.

translation.en: Please, Lena...
just buy the gems.
Hey.
-[Angela] Taxi for Knippenberg! -You took your bloody time.
-[man announces over PA in Thai] -It's almost curfew.
[Angela] Scheisse, Herman!
You know, anytime you want to learn to drive, I'll entirely support that decision.
translation.it: Quando vorrai imparare a guidare, appoggerò la tua decisione.

translation.en: You can call Yotin if you want someone to bark at.
translation.it: Ma chiama Yotin, se vuoi sfogarti.

translation.en: I can't call Yotin.
[sighs] No one at the Embassy can know what we're about to do.
translation.it: L'ambasciata non deve sapere quello che faremo.

translation.en: What if we're caught? If you're caught?
translation.it: E se ci scoprono? Se ti scoprono?

translation.en: What? Stern rebuke?
Or the chop?
It's very cold in Holland right now, Herman.
translation.it: Adesso fa molto freddo in Olanda, Herman.

translation.en: Have you thought about that?
Yeah. Have you?
Where to?
The police station. Eastern Division.
translation.it: Alla Stazione di Polizia. Divisione Orientale.

translation.en: A monkey! Oh, my God.
Who is your guest, Ajay?
translation.it: Chi è la tua ospite, Ajay?

translation.en: Hey, I'm Teresa.
-Monique. It's her place. -Oh, um, you're the gem dealer.
translation.it: - Monique. Questa è casa sua. - Sei la commerciante di gemme.

translation.en: I am not. He is the gem dealer.
translation.it: Non sono io. È lui il commerciante.

translation.en: My husband Alain.
[Teresa] You live with these guys?
-[Dominique] Yeah, they are cool. -[Teresa] You want to dance?
translation.it: - Sì, sono fichi. - Ti va di ballare?

translation.en: [Dominique] No, I don't dance.
Soon as it starts ringing, I've gotta go.
translation.it: Appena inizierà a suonare dovrò andare.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
That's okay.
-How do I say "I'm sorry" in French? -[clears throat] Um...
translation.it: Come si dice mi dispiace in francese?

translation.en: -Je suis désolée? Perfect? -Mm-hmm.
You know, it's crazy but I've never slept with a Frenchman before.
translation.it: È pazzesco, ma non sono mai andata a letto con un francese.

translation.en: [Charles] Dominique?
[in French] Monique needs you to bring up more ice.
[in French] Yes.
-So you are Teresa? -I am.
And you are American?
[Charles] Where are you heading?
[Teresa] Nepal, to a monastery.
If you're going to be a nun,
translation.it: Se hai intenzione di farti suora,

translation.en: why do you have all these travelers' cheques?
[chuckles] Well, they're not for me. They're for the monastery.
translation.it: Non sono per me, sono per il convento.

translation.en: [Charles] The cost of pursuing Nirvana goes up and up.
translation.it: Il costo per cercare il Nirvana diventa sempre più alto.

translation.en: So, you want to renounce the world entirely?
translation.it: E così vuoi rinunciare del tutto al mondo?

translation.en: No, I don't renounce the world.
translation.it: No, non ho rinunciato al mondo.

translation.en: Just the people who run it.
translation.it: Solo alle persone che lo gestiscono.

translation.en: On my heart, you are too young to lock yourself away.
Too young, too beautiful.
Your life too full of opportunity.
translation.it: La tua vita è troppo piena di opportunità.

translation.en: With you, you mean?
Did Ajay tell you what I do?
translation.it: Ajay ti ha detto quello che faccio?

translation.en: Yes. It's gems, right?
I buy. I sell. And from time to time, others sell for me.
translation.it: Compro, vendo. E ogni tanto, altri vendono per me.

translation.en: I am not going to smuggle gemstones for you.
translation.it: Non ho intenzione di contrabbandare pietre preziose per te.

translation.en: -I'm taking vows. -And yet I find you here,
translation.it: - Sto per prendere i voti. - Eppure ti trovo qui,

translation.en: openly offering yourself to my friend Dominique.
translation.it: a offrirti apertamente al mio amico Dominique.

translation.en: I'm not a nun yet.
In which case, may I ask, have you been to...
translation.it: Nel qual caso posso chiederti se sei mai stata...

translation.en: What shall we call them? Nightclubs here?
Oh, you mean the sex shows?
[chuckles] Well?
[sighs] I have not.
Then on this last night,
before you retreat from the world,
translation.it: prima che ti ritiri dal mondo,

translation.en: perhaps you should.
[Teresa howls and laughs] Oh, my God!
Heartwarming. [chuckles]
I'm gonna go.
Take it easy, Teresa.
Fuck! Fucking idiot.
You think I don't know how a fucking downer comes on?
-Don't touch me! Help! -[spectators cheering and whistling]
He's Alain, he's Ajay! They fucking drugged me!
translation.it: Quello è Alain, lui è Ajay, mi hanno drogata!

translation.en: Get her in the car.
[Charles] You draw attention to yourself, Teresa.
It's not prudent.
Drank too much.
[pants] Help.
[Teresa] Please take it all. Please take it.
-Won't the monastery miss it? -[Ajay chuckles]
You fucking asshole.
[Charles] You're vulgar.
You throw yourself at men the way you throw yourself at religion.
translation.it: Ti butti sugli uomini come ti butti sulla religione.

translation.en: You cannot buy your way off the wheel, Teresa.
translation.it: Non puoi scendere dalla ruota pagando, Teresa.

translation.en: It is very American of you to think otherwise.
translation.it: È molto americano da parte tua pensare questo.

translation.en: And as you may know,
Americans do not prosper in this part of the world.
translation.it: gli americani non hanno successo da queste parti.

translation.en: -Fuck you. -[Ajay] Hey, where are we going?
Aren't we leaving her at the Santa Cruz?
translation.it: Non la lasciamo al Santa Cruz?

translation.en: Where shall we leave her?
She's seen too much.
And you saw, she's not afraid to complain.
translation.it: E come hai notato, non ha paura di accusare.

translation.en: She will only be another reckless Westerner
who took drugs and went swimming.
translation.it: che si è drogata ed è andata a nuotare.

translation.en: [sighs] Once, I stole a taxi in Peshawar.
translation.it: Una volta ho rubato un taxi a Peshawar.

translation.en: I had to take it to Tehran, you see?
The driver refused so I had to dose him.
translation.it: Il taxista si è rifiutato, così l'ho drogato.

translation.en: I put him in the trunk...
and after some time,
he awoke and began to moan and thump.
translation.it: si è svegliato e ha iniziato a gemere e a dare colpi.

translation.en: It was upsetting the other passengers,
so I stopped at a river to check on him.
translation.it: e allora ho accostato vicino a un fiume per controllare.

translation.en: But he had suffocated,
so I took him out and helped him into the water.
translation.it: Così l'ho tirato fuori, e l'ho trascinato in acqua.

translation.en: I expected to feel great guilt,
translation.it: Mi aspettavo di sentirmi in colpa,

translation.en: but I did not,
I felt free.
Free from judgment.
Mine.
God's.
It was all entirely...
without tragedy.
Did they come looking for you? Did they catch you?
translation.it: Ti sono venuti a cercare? Ti hanno preso?

translation.en: Nobody has ever caught me, Ajay. No one.
translation.it: Nessuno mi ha mai preso, Ajay. Nessuno.

translation.en: We can do it together.
Are you gonna hurt me?
No. Better than that.
[Teresa] Oh, compassionate ones.
This person is going from this world
translation.it: Questa persona sta passando da questo mondo

translation.en: to the other shore.
She is leaving this world.
She is dying without choice.
She has no friends.
She is suffering greatly.
She has no refuge.
She has no protector.
She has no allies.
The light of this life has set.
translation.it: La luce di questo mondo si è spenta.

translation.en: She is embarking on a great battle.
translation.it: Entrerà in un grande campo di battaglia.

translation.en: She is seized by the great evil spirit.
translation.it: Sarà afferrata da possenti forze maligne.

translation.en: She is terrified by the messengers
of the Lord of Death.
She is entering existence after existence.
Because of her karma, she is helpless.
translation.it: A causa del suo karma è debole.

translation.en: The time has come when she must go alone
translation.it: È giunto il momento, ma lei deve camminare da sola.

translation.en: without a friend.
-[Lena sighs and groans] -[Wim] Lena. Shh.
[Angela] Are those dead bodies?
Yes. Burned, I think.
What's wrong with us?
Monique? Please.
[Wim] And the remains of their clothing.
translation.it: E i resti dei loro vestiti.

translation.en: Look!
My God.
It's them.
-[Lena] Alain, please help us. -[Charles] Shh.
Why has no one done anything?
